http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/11294.html

*Sigh*

I fell for the same old shit.

Can you blame me for wanting too believe that someone really loved me, that much?

                                                                                                                             That he really did care.

That I was worth something to someone.

Without fail he always seem to take away the one thing that I still respect about myself.  This time it was my ability to hear someone's words, and believe in them... and be right about their background reasons for saying it, whatever it is.

I have never been so wrong.

And it hurts too say that... because I've never wanted to be right so badly.

Inside I knew. That it was all a lie, I only wanted truth though... didn't matter what it was... so why did he have too lie?





I want so much to be told that I'm wrong, that I'm dead wrong to not trust or respect him.

What happened this morning was fairly childish, and more than embaressing... and I'm sorry for that. I couldn't listen to that voice again. The one that has told me that if we're together, maybe we'll make it through... because a lot of the time that's all I wanted.

You could've just told me what you wanted. I wouldn't have complained, much. The lies hurt so much more. And now... I'm not sure we can even be friends. Be in each others lives... and I wanted that soo very much for us.


*sigh*

Maybe I'm just an idiot. That sounds about appropriate. Fuck it hurts.


<3333Gen .xoxox.

It might be nice to fall in love, to fall out of it.
Me? I had too crash into it, and never come out until I was on fire with the pain...
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/10824.html

So... last entry.

Way too depressed for my liking.

Doing better now.

haaha. More like just supressed it all again!

Yay for being a counsellor's nightmare!

*sigh* Its what I live for. 



So... I did something very stupid on Monday/Tuesday.

Please shoot me. FUCK why am I so stupid?

The results: Me, being back in my insomniac world. ffuuuucckk

I need to learn how to NOT think. My whole not-existing though is looking pretty good right now.

I want too ssllleeeppppp.

gawd.


Attn: I need someone who's willing to run my life for me, take all control out of my hands. Cause control? It sucks. Not only does it make me responsible for my lame-ass decisions, I have to live with the consequences too.

I can't BELIEVE I was stupid enough to get myself back into this position. I like knowing I was capable of it, cause yay, go seductiveness, but now?

Hello consequences
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/10261.html

How is it possible that my fucking boss at work, and the head waitress care more about me than my parents?

They seem to know how to deal with me, understand what I'm going through, and are worried about me.

I'm so lost/confused/fuckedup/broken right now that I don't even know how I'm supposed to function.


I can't do this. I don't want too. Why do I have too?

I don't. And I'm sick of being the fucking strong one.

So this is me, wallowing in self-pity and self-loathing.

There is something seriously wrong with me.u



                            Someone drug me up. Now. Please?

Reality fucking bites. So does sobriety. Shoot me.


Anyywwayyyss, I'm not really one for wallowing in the emotional cesspool.

SomebodyBetterFuckingLearnToLoveMe.

Because I really am starting to hate myself.

http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/9165.html

So... He's Gone.

Bye bye.

The last thing he saw was me, looking like a little fucking skank, baked out of my mind.


I.... This really means theres no chance. Of us ever even having a intense conversation again. 


Did he understand thats all I want? His honesty.... his trust.


But he could never give it too me again, no after I destroyed it that badly the first time. But its not my fault, I won't blame myself... I tried, at least.








I hurt. Really bad. Inside.

I learned something today though... in the end, all I have is me. No one else can help, even if they wanted too.

So yeah. Life lessons suck monkey balls.

*sigh* Tonight= lots and lots of drugs. Yay self-medication! =D


-Gen

Destroying my mind with drugs..

My friends are my world, music is my saviour.

NO MORE FUCKING DRAMA PLEASE!!!!

Ummm. Yeah?

I'm so afraid of love and... getting close to people. Vulnerability is fucking wayyy too scary for me.

So I'm basically just... chilling with friends, failing school, working my ass off at work... trying to salvage my relationship with the parentals.

It has its ups and downs.

Andi, I love you!

Yeah, my friends are my life. My family bites. I love music, acting, movies, the beach, gardening and Buffy.

Ask Away!

It's the bitter cold that reminds me of you,
Your icy inside,
comforting a warm soul.
A dark warmth, hidden by your tear stained eyes
and your warm blooded kiss that stings with pain on my hollow insides.
It's the bitter cold that brings back the blood stained memories of you,
it's the bitter cold that reminds me of why you left me.

Written for me by a friend. I loves it.

~Gen

The girl smiles slightly, knowing she pushes herself to this level... for mere amusment, because she left life behind a long time ago.


I'm writing more. Reading more. Escaping into other peoples lives because I don't know what else to do.

And its not that bad at all. It makes me happy actually. My life only works when I'm not living it.

Heh heh. That's funny! I think.

I'm bored right now. Everyone is ohh-ing and ahh-ing over pictures upstairs... so down here is better.

My hair is brown! I like it. It's... plainer. Hah. I love how I never get any comments on my journal. Though people do apparently read it. Nice to know I'm not talking to myself.

And I'm going to go read now.

Blood and Gold by Ann Rice again. Very very good book.
~Gen

So I'm most definately fuckered again.

Damn.

My last post was so true. Hah, I actually hate it when I'm right...

I don't feel anything right now. I've only cried like, for 10 minutes.... then its just blessed calm and bad habits.

Meh, I'll survive....

I think.

So I'm back in my pretty, pretty hole... I think I'll probably stay here for the next month or so... yay!

That, or forget the last ten days.... which is highly unlikely.

Or the best option, I'll stay here forever... =D

~Gen.... not Genny, Genny went away.
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/5718.html

How is it that things seem to get so good and there like that for a couple days.... and then my brain kicks in.

Why do I do this? fuck!!!!


I want to be happy really I do, but I can't be oblivious to things that are going on around me... please make me stop second guessing myself... then I talk to people I trust more than anything and they can't make my mind peaceful and usually do quite the opposite because they see the same thing.... and I'm blabbering simply because I can't stop...

I can't face it because I don't want to push it away but I can't ignore it either... I'm more scared of myself than anything else.

I know this is going to get me in trouble, but I had too, can't hold it in any longer.....



I love you, that's why I'm scared... because I really don't think you feel the same.... and if you don't?

Goddess, just tell me, because I'd rather have my heart-broken than be lied too.

~Gen
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/5426.html

I'm in the best mood ever. Honestly. The last place... well, not last, but certainly close was the place that gave me hope. That made me happy.

=D Yay!

I won't explain.... I know this is painfully new for {        } so I can just be here to help.

Its fairly new for me too, especially to care this much.

I'm honestly giddy-happy.

I love you-I love you-I love you-I love you.

Scary, I know.

I'm so much more useful to other people when I'm all happy-like.

The only thing I'm truly -afraid- of is peoples reactions. I know that if they truly care then they'll deal with it.... but I can't help that a lot of them may not be able too. I know the afore mentioned person is scared of it too.... but I honestly won't let other people get in the way this time. No No No.


<3 xoxo.
Gen.

http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/4774.html

So. Apparently I haave become so heinously, horribly bored lately that I must turn to talking to myself, aka, you folks.

*Sigh*

It's either that or actually do my homework to prep for exams so.... I return to this.

Do this please, seeing as I have nothing more to do in my meaningless time.

01. Tell me your name.
02. A word that you like.

And I will tell you:

01. What I think of you.
02. What animal you remind me of.
03. How much you piss me off.
04. Advice, maybe in the form of a quote or ramblings, whatever I feel like.


Alright then, cherrio gentle readers.

~Gen
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/4248.html

Also.... I'm much, much to lazy to go get my notebook.
These may be too easy to guess but.... I don't really care. None of them are bad things.

1. I miss you. I can't stand that you left a hole for yourself in me and then just left.... you didn't even say goodbye. It's selfish of me to say I wish you had stayed, but I can't help it.

2. Your arrogance at times amuses me and sometimes disapoints me. I know we're no longer friends, but I read what you think and I want to try to comfort you. No matter what you do or say you'll never completely lose the amazing person you used to be, becase she's still there. The way you are contstantly depressed makes me wonder what buisness you have thinking. Joking. I know you don't care about me, but I will always always be here for you if you need me.
Ps. That one is disgustingly ovbious.

3.I worry about you. You hide so much of yourself from everyone and you neer show your emotions. Your leaving me.... not for forever, but for long enough. I won't dare ask you to stay, because I think you'll be happier where your going.I'm going to miss you.... soo much.

4. I barely know you. Even though this is true, I feel close to you and count you among my most amazing friends. I know you have secrets and I itch to know them.... sorry, that's what I do. I love you and care about you and worry about you.

5. You are my best friend. You haven't been in my life long, but you know more about me then most people do. I'm so grateful you trust me as much as you do. Your my sister, the one I know I can always count on.

6. Fuck you. I love you and I hate you. I can't stand the way you treat me, but your strength and personality leave me awestruck. Everytime I talk to you I might as well have lit myself on fire. I wish I knew more about you.... but I am grateful that I know more than most. You understand me better than most people, but you constantly underestimate me, as well as overestimate me. There isn't one person on this entire planet that I care about as much as you. Which really sucks, cause you ovbiously don't care about me that way.

7. You make me happy. I'm around you and everything seems okay. I know you would never hurt me and I know you care. I love the way you talk and the way you treat other people. Your such an amazing person that I would lve to spend every walking moment with you.


There are so many more people I could do this for, but I don't think I will. Here are two major catagories that most other people fit into.

1. I hate you. You disgust me, you piss me off and I don't even know why I think your worth my time. But I also know, that deep down in every single one of you there is a good person, so that's why I waste my time trying to find that person.

2. You are amazing. We've had our ups and downs,mostly because I'm not the easiest person to get along with. I wish I knew more about you and could be closer to you. 




That's about it. Thanks for reading, comment if you wish, and guess away!

<3 Gen
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/3921.html

So right now I'm in Saskatoon.

The wedding was stunning, perfect, and carried off without a flaw.

News Flash: My cousin, the one person in my entire family alike to me, is in love and undeniably happy.

*sigh*

Go back to square one, Gen.

For those of you wondering, square one would be me with a horrible family.

On the bright side, my crazy minister uncle convinced my dad to let me get my nose pierced and my aunt lost around 60 pounds. Who knew she was capable of looking that good?

I'm doing alright I guess. My life isn't horrible and I haven't done drugs for 21 days. I've also been drunk for the best three. I love weddings for the reason that my dad gets drunk and buys me ceasars. I think it was around 8 of them.... but I kind-of lost count around 4.

I do realze this entry is completely long and pointless, but my extended family is upstairs drunk as skunks, so I'd rather hide down here listening to music and petting this extremely cute kitten my cousin just got.


Love and missing you to all my people back home,

<3Gen xoxo.

I hate adults.

 

Especially the ones who live with me.

They now apparently hate one of the only people I actually care about even though they've never met him. Why you ask? Because hes that "creep" who's a bad influence.

 

If only they had any idea who I was.

I have a plan that totally doesn't match their plan for me too.

My plan: Move out to Carlie's @ 17/Grad from school as soon as possible/go to college for as short as possible/Get a job I enjoy/Find love/have people around me who make me happy. Main Goal: Just to be happy.

Their plan: Live with them until I'm like, 23./Do every single course in school with amazing grades/go to best university in Canada/become a lawyer/ become rich, marry my best friend, just like they did. Main Goal: Get job that pays a lot.  

 

Yeah..... a little Different yes?

 

<3 Gen
http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/2323.html

I'm sick. In the head and not feeling so great is my body too.

 

I need to take control again.

Starting with a little spring cleaning.... out with most of the negative, in with all the positive.

 

It's working so far, in my mind. Whether it works in reality, well, I'll just have to see.

 

Another fucking list.

1- I don't eat. This I know. Does it matter? It doesn't affect me negatively.... I actually like it.

2- Wear colour. This is going to be very difficult for me. But whatever, most things are.

3- Get friends that actually make me happy.... that don't bring me down.

4- Get rid of my incredibly shitty attitude.

 

Yeah. I don't understand the first one either. Oh well! :)

For now, I've decided to stop hiding in my house... a new idea, I know.

<3 Gen.

I think its that whole smiling buisness. Rather disgusting isn't it?

There's lots of other stuff I could talk about. I can't seem to put the energy into being anything right now. Including being useful. So, I'll go read and listen to pretty pretty music.

I <3 Greeley Estates.

Signing away!

http://blood-enigma.livejournal.com/1826.html

So, I've decided.

 

1) People should mind their own fucking buisness.

2) They should also keep their mouths shut, if they plan on ruining my good mood.

3) People in general, if their not going to give me my way... should leave me and music the fuck alone.

 

That's my 3 rules for today. I'm thinking the next day. And the day after that. You get my point.

 

Anyways, I've also decided that people can be worthless little pieces of shit. I know, you would have thought I would have figured that out by now but no, I still had hope in the human race.

 

Fuck that, now.

Yes. I'm done. Thanks ever so much. The funny part? Until I went to my locker between 2nd and 3rd block I was in a really amazing mood.

 

<3 {Not for some of yeh.} Gen

Your Beauty lies in Contradiction. Controversial, unpredictable, and never what anyone expects. You appearance and your personality are two opposite things. Even your appearance sends different signals to different people. To some you may look innocent and sweet, to others you look mysterious and intimidating at the same time. No one ever knows what to expect with you. You are a little bit of everything all mixed together. You can be watching the football game with the guys one minute and the next out shopping at the mall. You seem to be almost a different person every time you meet someone, but at the same time you know exactly who you are and there is always that one thing that makes you you. You enjoy keeping people guessing and people love how completely unpredictable you are.

Some Things That Represent You:

Element: Fire, Water Animal: Chameleon Color: Dark Tones, Light Tones Song: Everything by Alanis Morriesette Expression: Half-smile

Gemstone: Bloodstone Mythological Creature: Gryphon, Half-breeds Planet: Mars Hair Color: Red Eye Color: Blue

Quote: "Appearances can be deceiving."
